local_intent: Reacquire the green bin and align precisely to the bin lid, retrying if needed, then verify the pose at the lid.
assumptions: Starting from MoveAbove provides a safe pre-alignment pose.
IsAt(bin_lid) serves as verification of successful alignment.
coherence_with_global: Implements visibility check/scan, detection, safe pre-grasp, precise ApproachAndAlign with limited retries, and verification—matching steps 1–4 of the global plan for the verify phase.
